amendment.description: To improve the Rural Energy for America Program.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3181 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 3181 proposed by Senator Roberts for Senator Enzi to Amendment SA 3224. (consideration: CR S4713-4714; text: CR S4714) To improve the Rural Energy for America Program.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 3181 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
